params.modules: Array of module addresses to add (optional, can be empty)
params.names: Array of module names (must match modules.length)

addComplianceModule(address,string).details: Module will be checked on all transfers

addLotModule(bytes32,address).details: This module will only be checked for transfers involving this specific lot

params.lotId: Lot ID to attach module to

returns._0: True if lot has specific modules

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

processTransferCompliance(address,addres.details: Called by TokenTransferFacet after successful transfer to update module state

setLotAffiliate(bytes32,address,bool).details: Requires admin permission, then calls AffiliateStatusModuleLot ID parameter is unused as affiliate status is per-holder not per-lot

setLotLockup(bytes32,uint256).details: Requires admin permission, then calls LockupComplianceModule

params.unlockTime: Unix timestamp when lot becomes transferable

setLotVesting(bytes32,address,uint256,ui.details: Requires admin permission, converts amount to basis points for corporate action compatibility

params.revocable: Whether the schedule can be revoked
params.tokenHolder: Address that will receive vested tokens
params.totalAmount: Total amount to vest (in real/human-readable token units, e.g. 1,000,000)

validateTransferCompliance(address,addre.details: Called by TokenTransferFacet before executing transfers

params.lotId: Lot ID (if lot-based transfer, otherwise bytes32(0))

getApplicableModules(bytes32).notice: Get applicable modules for a lot transfer

isModuleRegistered(address).notice: Check if a module is registered

lotHasSpecificModules(bytes32).notice: Check if a lot has specific modules

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

processTransferCompliance(address,addres.notice: Process transfer through compliance modules (for state changes)

setLotAffiliate(bytes32,address,bool).notice: Set affiliate status for a lot holder

setLotLockup(bytes32,uint256).notice: Set lockup period for a lot

setLotVesting(bytes32,address,uint256,ui.notice: Create vesting schedule for a lot

validateTransferCompliance(address,addre.notice: Validate transfer against all applicable compliance modules
